mapper.select: SELECT S_NO , CI_NO FROM COMPANY_INFO WHERE M_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BASIC_INFO B LEFT JOIN RESUME R ON(B.R_NO = R.R_NO) WHERE S_NO = #{userSno} AND R_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND R_DELETE_YN = 'N'

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , NLIST.* FROM( SELECT B.R_NO , R.R_ENROLL_DATE , R.M_NO , S.S_NAME , B.BI_TITLE , B.BI_NAME , B.BI_GENDER , B.BI_BIRTH_DATE , B.BI_AGE , B.BI_EMAIL , B.BI_ADDRESS , B.BI_ADDRESS_DETAIL , (SELECT count(*) FROM RESUME_BROWSE WHERE CI_NO = #{cino} AND R_NO = B.R_NO) as cnt FROM BASIC_INFO B LEFT JOIN RESUME R ON(B.R_NO = R.R_NO) LEFT JOIN SECTOR S ON(B.S_NO = S.S_NO) WHERE B.S_NO = #{userSno} AND R_STATUS_YN = 'Y' AND R_DELETE_YN = 'N' ORDER BY B.R_NO DESC) NLIST) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN (#{pi.page}-1)*(#{pi.boardLimit})+1 AND ((#{pi.page}-1)*(#{pi.boardLimit})+1)+(#{pi.boardLimit}-1)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RESUME_BROWSE ( CI_NO , R_NO , RB_BROWSE , RB_DATE ) VALUES ( #{cino} , #{rno} , 'recommened' , SYSDATE )
